divs: sighting detailsat 9:08pm on 11\14\12 i was at my back door letting my dog inside when i noticed something in the sky that appeared to be flying slowly from my right to left, just above the tree line. there were 3 lights that formed a triangle. it was dark so i couldn't tell if the lights were on an object or 3 independent objects. it stopped, hovered for about 2-3 minutes, then the lights just faded away. it appeared to be within a couple of blocks from my house, made no noise at all. there were 2 other people with me who also witnessed this. we attempted to record this event with our phone cameras but it can barely be seen.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Beachwood
There were no other sightings in Beachwood on or around November 14th 2012
Summary: Saw 3 lights in the shape of a triangle hover very low around the tree line then disappear.
